newsitem.title: USA: PSA confirms early close Aug 30, close Sept 2.
newsitem.headline: PSA confirms early close Aug 30, close Sept 2.

text.p: The Public Securities Association (PSA) confirmed its recommendation of an early close of trading on Friday, August 30 and a full close on Monday, September 2.
PSA, the bond market trade association, recommended U.S. debt markets close at 1400EDT/1800GMT next Friday ahead of the Labor Day weekend.
It recommended markets remain closed on Labor Day, Monday, September 2.

The recommendations would affect trading of U.S. government securities, mortgage securities, certain corporate bonds and municipal bonds, and secondary money market trading in bankers acceptances, commercial paper and certificates of deposit, PSA said.
